t: Amazon Healthcare Strategy l CB Insights
s: June 26, 2020 - Amazon now offers Medicaid beneficiaries a discounted Prime membership, though it doesn’t yet extend to Amazon Fresh or Prime Pantry discounts. This could change in the future — and we might even see the ability to use SNAP (supplemental nutrition benefits) on the site directly.
